articles.description: WASHINGTON (SBG) — A new glove can help translate American Sign Language to speech in real time. The glove was created by scientists at UCLA. Sensors running along the glove and read movements to identify letters, words and phrases. The movements are th…

articles.title: Google now lets you see dinosaurs in the real world through augmented reality - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s augmented reality animals let you see what creatures like tigers, scorpions, and bears might look like in real life. Now, the company has added a herd of 10 dinosaurs to its AR menagerie. Just search the names on a supported device to see how’d they …
articles.content:
See what Tyrannosaurus rex would look like in your backyard
You can choose from 10 dinosaurs, including Tyrannosaurus Rex, Velociraptor, and Triceratops.
